name: Alexander M. Fraser
content: Prof. Dr. Alexander M. Fraser Prof. Dr. Alexander M. Fraser Old position: Professor für Informations- und Sprachverarbeitung (Professor for Information and Language Processing) Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München (LMU Munich) Centrum für Informations- und Sprachverarbeitung (Center for Information and Language Processing) Oettingenstraße 67 80538 München email: Substitute My Last Name Here @cis.uni-muenchen.de up-to-date web: https://alexfraser.github.io Office hours: by appointment (please email) Telephone hours: by appointment (please email) Old Position at LMU: I was a tenured professor with membership in both the Faculty of Languages and Literature (Fak 13) and the Faculty of Mathematics, Computer Science and Statistics (Fak 16, Zweitmitgliedschaft) at LMU Munich. New position: Chaired professorship for Data Analytics & Statistics at the computer science department of the Technical University of Munich (TUM) in the School of Computation, Information and Technology. My main functions at TUM will be at the new campus in Heilbronn (near Stuttgart). But I will also be in Munich and Garching occasionally. I will continue to be a PI of the Munich Center for Machine Learning (MCML) and member of the ELLIS Unit Munich. Interested in the intersection of natural language processing and machine learning. This web page will no longer be updated. Please check my new web page here. Research Publications and Research Interests ERC Starting Grant (EU Horizon2020) Health in my Language (HimL) (EU Horizon2020) Models of Morphosyntax for Statistical Machine Translation (DFG Project (2 phases)) TTC - Terminology Extraction, Translation Tools and Comparable Corpora (EU FP7 Project) Teaching - Past click here
